name: Time To Wake Up
description:
Tele-Dash Your Way out of this Chaotic Dream Realm!
  • Challenging Levels to Tele-Dash & Bullet Time Through
  • Move with "A & D"
  • Jump, Double Jump and Wall Jump with "Space"
  • Charge your Tele-Dash and "aim with your mouse, Right-Click" to Tele Dash!
  • Recharge your Tele-Dash by Touching Blue Energy Orbs (They Respawn after 3 Seconds)
  • Use Bullet Time with "Shift" (Recharges every 3 Seconds)
  • Find which realms lay behind the portals!
  • Make it to the end!

Good luck!

Bastian

P.s. If you want to find out how the game was made check out DevLog Brackeys Game Jam - Time to Wake Up!
